text: Edward or Edi Ziegler may refer to: *Edward Danner Ziegler (1844–1931), American local official and Democratic legislator *Edward Ziegler (music journalist) (1870–1947), American writer and opera manager *Edi Ziegler (born 1930), German road racing cyclist ==See also== *Ziegler (surname)
title: Edward Ziegler
